name: constraints
title: Prepare Constraints Data
description: A component that adds constraints data for Location Allocation.

inputs.name: compatible_table
inputs.title: Compatible (optional)
inputs.description: The source table containing required facility-demand point pairs.
inputs.helper: The source table containing required facility-demand point pairs.

inputs.name: uncompatible_table

inputs.description: The source table containing banned facility-demand point pairs.
inputs.helper: The source table containing banned facility-demand point pairs.

inputs.name: compatible_bool
inputs.title: Include required facility-demand point pairs
inputs.description: Whether to consider mandatory relationships between facilities and demand points.
inputs.helper: Whether to consider mandatory relationships between facilities and demand points.

inputs.name: compatible_facility_id
inputs.title: Facilities ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the facility IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the facility IDs.

inputs.name: compatible_dpoint_id
inputs.title: Demand points ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the demand point IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the demand point IDs.

inputs.name: uncompatible_bool
inputs.title: Include banned facility-demand point pairs
inputs.description: Whether to consider prohibited relationships between facilities and demand points.
inputs.helper: Whether to consider prohibited relationships between facilities and demand points.

inputs.name: uncompatible_facility_id
inputs.title: Facilities ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the facility IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the facility IDs.

inputs.name: uncompatible_dpoint_id
inputs.title: Demand points ID column
inputs.description: The column containing the demand point IDs.
inputs.helper: The column containing the demand point IDs.
